title: Battaramulla
details: Pelawatta Battaramulla - house in a very secure neighborhood, 500 meters to Pelawatta junction, 3300 sq ft, 10 perches of land. 4 bedrooms, 3 rooms A/C, 3 bathrooms with hot water. Master bedroom with walk in closet and balcony. A/C family room/ TV lounge. Fitted pantry with teak wood cupboards. Kitchen with fitted cupboards, maids room with bathroom. Covered parking for 2 vehicles with remote gate. Garden area in front and back of the house. RS 32m negotiable
